verbs.description: U.S. authorities [V: are] transferring into federal prisons about 1,600 Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ) detainees , officials told Reuters on Thursday , in the first large - scale use of federal prisons to hold detainees amid a Trump administration crackdown on people entering the country illegally .
